forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun this morning with increasing clouds this afternoon. High 21C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun this morning with increasing clouds this afternoon. High near 70F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp late. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 61F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
